doc.title: 3 Rounds
doc.plot: Amateur boxer Micky Savage enters a local contest in hopes of winning enough money to finally buy an engagement ring for the love of his life. His Uncle Joe, a former boxer, mans Micky's corner but wishes the kid would reconsider. If Micky can last 3 Rounds with the local champion he'll win, but when the first bell sounds he's in for the fight of his life. How far can he go for love?
